title: FTP Client recursively only lists root directory
body:
version: [latest](https://github.com/zhanghai/MaterialFiles/commit/faf6c1fe526e0bae3048070a8d1b742ff62c8e6f)
steps to reproduce:
- add a [FritzBox](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fritz!Box) NAS as FTP server
- open added storage -> works as expected
- try to open folder

expected result:
- contents of selected folder is shown

actual result:
- root directory is shown again while selected folder is added to breadcrumbs

Unfortunately, I don't know what causes this to happen on the Fritzbox FTP server, but not on others.
I tested [this solution](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/63027930/org-apache-commons-net-ftp-ftpclient-listfiles-always-returns-files-from-root-di/63031032#63031032) posted on stackoverflow and it indeed solves the issue. (Adding `changeWorkingDirectory(pathname)` [here](https://github.com/zhanghai/MaterialFiles/blob/faf6c1fe526e0bae3048070a8d1b742ff62c8e6f/app/src/main/java/me/zhanghai/android/files/provider/ftp/client/FTPClientCompat.kt#L33))
